property.name: Pin
property.description: The pin to which the button is connected.

property.name: InvertedLogic
property.description: True, if the button state is inverted comparing to a value that is read at the pin, false otherwise.

property.name: PullupResistor
property.description: True, if the pull-up resistor is enabled at the pin, false otherwise.

property.name: ReportOnState
property.description: True, if the continues reporting of the ON state is enabled, false otherwise.

property.name: ReportOffState
property.description: True, if the continues reporting of the OFF state is enabled, false otherwise.

property.name: ReportCyclesCount
property.description: The number of reads after which the state reporting event is fired.

property.name: ReadInterval
property.description: Interval in milliseconds in which the state of the associated hw pin is read. This value is also used as a debounce interval.

event.name: OnStateChanged
event.description: When the logical state of pin changed.

event.name: OnStateReported
event.description: When the logical state of pin is reported.
